info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:38AM CDT until August 12 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Macoupin County in southwestern Illinois... Eastern Jersey County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 238 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greenfield, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jerseyville, Carlinville, Staunton, Virden, Gillespie, Brighton, Girard, Mount Olive, Bunker Hill, Benld, Palmyra, Shipman, Wilsonville, Sawyerville, Mount Clare, East Gillespie, Eagarville, Kemper, Piasa, and Medora. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 41 and 44. This also includes Beaver Dam State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
